bulletins.title: Battery discharged.
problems: Battery discharged.
Irregular operation of AC compressor clutch.
causes: AC compressor clutch relay faulty.Note: This fault is only associated with relays made by Omron.

steps: Replace AC compressor clutch relay.

notes: Note: This fault is only associated with relays made by Omron.

bulletins.title: Creaking noise from windscreen wipers.
problems: Creaking noise from windscreen wipers.
causes: Side panel and windscreen lower panel rubbing together.

steps: Remove engine bay trim panels to gain access to right-hand bonnet hinge.
Increase the clearance between side panel and windscreen lower panel. Modify affected area using a hammer and a suitable tool (centre punch) Fig.118865.1.
ViewView more informationFig.118865

bulletins.title: Diesel particulate filter (DPF) warning lamp illuminated.
affected_vehicles: All models with Diesel particulate filter (DPF) and engine code N22B3.
problems: Diesel particulate filter (DPF) warning lamp illuminated.
Engine oil level too high.
causes: DPF regeneration process repeatedly not completed due to engine control module (ECM) software fault.

steps: Carry out electrical, mechanical and component tests (as applicable) to eliminate any other possible cause(s).
If no fault(s) found: Re-program ECM with upgraded software.
Change engine oil and filter.

notes: Note: To carry out an effective repair a software upgrade will be required - refer to manufacturer.

bulletins.title: Engine malfunction indicator lamp (MIL) illuminated. Trouble code stored: P0087.
problems: Engine malfunction indicator lamp (MIL) illuminated. Trouble code stored: P0087.
Engine runs in limp home mode.

steps: Carry out electrical, mechanical and component tests (as applicable) to eliminate any other possible cause(s).
If no fault(s) found: Re-program engine control module (ECM) with upgraded software.

notes: Note: To carry out an effective repair a software upgrade will be required - refer to manufacturer.

bulletins.title: Engine oil level too high.
affected_vehicles: All models with Diesel particulate filter (DPF) and engine code N22B3.
problems: Diesel particulate filter (DPF) warning lamp illuminated.
Engine oil level too high.
causes: DPF regeneration process repeatedly not completed due to engine control module (ECM) software fault.

steps: Carry out electrical, mechanical and component tests (as applicable) to eliminate any other possible cause(s).
If no fault(s) found: Re-program ECM with upgraded software.
Change engine oil and filter.

notes: Note: To carry out an effective repair a software upgrade will be required - refer to manufacturer.

bulletins.title: Engine runs in limp home mode.
problems: Engine malfunction indicator lamp (MIL) illuminated. Trouble code stored: P0087.
Engine runs in limp home mode.

steps: Carry out electrical, mechanical and component tests (as applicable) to eliminate any other possible cause(s).
If no fault(s) found: Re-program engine control module (ECM) with upgraded software.

notes: Note: To carry out an effective repair a software upgrade will be required - refer to manufacturer.

bulletins.title: Irregular operation of AC compressor clutch.
problems: Battery discharged.
Irregular operation of AC compressor clutch.
causes: AC compressor clutch relay faulty.Note: This fault is only associated with relays made by Omron.

steps: Replace AC compressor clutch relay.

notes: Note: This fault is only associated with relays made by Omron.

bulletins.title: Loss of braking efficiency.
problems: Loss of braking efficiency.
Trouble codes stored: 43, 47.
causes: Incorrect front brake system fluid pressure.

steps: Check front ABS brake fluid pressure sensors for correct operation before replacing ABS hydraulic modulator.

notes: Note: Front ABS brake fluid pressure sensors are not integral to ABS hydraulic modulator.

bulletins.title: Rear folding seat base latch difficult to disengage.
problems: Rear folding seat base latch difficult to disengage.
causes: Rear folding seat base catch misaligned.

steps: Using a suitable tool, adjust rear folding seat base catch.

bulletins.title: Shudder from rear of vehicle when cornering.
affected_vehicles: All models with four wheel drive.
problems: Shudder from rear of vehicle when cornering.
causes: Incorrect specification rear differential oil used.

steps: Renew rear differential oil. Ensure rear differential oil to manufacturer's specifications.

bulletins.title: Squeaking/creaking noise when clutch pedal depressed or released.
problems: Squeaking/creaking noise when clutch pedal depressed or released.
causes: Clutch master cylinder and clutch pedal misaligned.

steps: Slacken clutch master cylinder retaining bolts.
Fully depress clutch pedal and hold down.
Tighten clutch master cylinder retaining bolts. Tightening torque: 22 Nm.
Release clutch pedal.

bulletins.title: Trouble codes stored: 43, 47.
problems: Loss of braking efficiency.
Trouble codes stored: 43, 47.
causes: Incorrect front brake system fluid pressure.

steps: Check front ABS brake fluid pressure sensors for correct operation before replacing ABS hydraulic modulator.

notes: Note: Front ABS brake fluid pressure sensors are not integral to ABS hydraulic modulator.

bulletins.title: Vibration through vehicle when engine idling or on light throttle. More pronounced in cold weather.
problems: Vibration through vehicle when engine idling or on light throttle. More pronounced in cold weather.
causes: Rear exhaust silencer mounting rubbers excessively compressed due to silencer hanger bracket incorrectly positioned.

steps: Remove rear exhaust silencer.
Adjust rear exhaust silencer hanger brackets:Raise silencer hanger LH bracket by 2 - 3 mm Fig.125598.Lower silencer hanger RH bracket by 2 - 3 mm Fig.125598.
Raise silencer hanger LH bracket by 2 - 3 mm Fig.125598.
Lower silencer hanger RH bracket by 2 - 3 mm Fig.125598.
Refit rear exhaust silencer.
Raise silencer hanger LH bracket by 2 - 3 mm Fig.125598.
Lower silencer hanger RH bracket by 2 - 3 mm Fig.125598.
ViewView more informationFig.125598
